channel.title: telnet on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in telnet on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] There is no telnet! At such times
item.description: When working with Server, sometimes you want to use telnet for other purposes than telnet, right? Right? Right? For example, when you want to speak HTTP or SMTP when you want to speak live, use POP3 (ry So, to the contrary, $ telnet localhost 80 zsh: command not found: telnet Too bad. I don’t panic at such times. $ python -m telnetlib localhost 80 You know, you don’t need telnet!
